member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.Exception.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.IPP.Exception stores IPP exceptions categorized as SDK Exception and Service Exception. SDK Exceptions are exceptions that occur within the SDK, for example, SerializationException, De-SerializationException, and so forth. Service Exceptions are exceptions returned from REST service or network related exceptions, for example, CommunicationException, RetryException, and so forth. The Intuit.IPP.Exception assembly has IdsExceptionManager class that manages all IDS exceptions. Error messages or error codes can be used to call the HandleException methods, if there are no IPP exceptions.
